name: KARMORA
description:
Step into the mystical universe of KARMORA

This adult RPG places you in the shoes of a man who finds himself mysteriously transported into a magical realm known as Karmora.

The problem with this new realm is that things are not exactly as they seem. With the help of your trusty A.i, you begin to realise that you somehow have a strange ability. An ability that allows you to reshape the universe as you wish.

What you do with this power is entirely up to you.



  • Create a mirror protagonist
  • Customise everything
  • Travel the universe in FTL travel
  • Explore romantic options with different characters
  • HD 2D Graphics
  • Rewrite the paths in which the characters take.
